page.title: 05MY OPINION ON THE COUNTRY
page.content: I think that England is a pretty good Country and i think there shouldn't be any war or quarrels over silly matters.I think there should be more jobs but the trouble is,that more and more computers are taking over different sorts of jobs.I think we should have heavier fines for people who drop litter and more official tips where can go to dump their rubbish.We should have a bigger police force so that law and order can be held.Every shop should have the latest in burglar alarms.I dont think we should have nuclear weapons if one is fired it could kill millions of people.I wish also that we could find a new source of fuel for cars so we cut down pollution.We shouldn't use aerosol cans because the perpellant destroys the ozone layer and the atmosphere wouldn't protect us. By Marc Davies
